verses.roman:
iṣṭa-goṣṭhī kṛṣṇa-kathā kahi' kata-kṣaṇa
prabhu-pada dhari' rāya kare nivedana

synonyms: iṣṭa-goṣṭhī—spiritual discussion; kṛṣṇa-kathā—topics of Kṛṣṇa; kahi'-talking; kata-kṣaṇa—for some time; prabhu-pada—the lotus feet of the Lord; dhari'-catching; rāya—Rāmānanda Rāya; kare—makes; nivedana—submission.
translation: That next evening, after discussing the topic of Kṛṣṇa for some time, Rāmānanda Rāya caught hold of the lotus feet of the Lord and spoke as follows.
